name: Concentrate
text: Response Remove, destroy 1 foundation: After an ability on an action card is played, cancel it. Enhance: If you have taken damage this turn, add this card to your momentum

name: Kurogiri
text: Enhance [Once per turn]: Look at the top and bottom card of your deck. You may add the bottom card of your deck to the top of your deck. Response Commit: After your rival plays an attack add it to the bottom of thier deck. Choose 1 attack card in your rival's discard pile and add it to their hand.

name: Midnight
text: Enhance Commit: Discard any number of cards and draw 1 card for each card discarded. Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 or -1 speed for each of its keywords. Playable while committed.

name: Present Mic
text: Enhance Commit: Remove the top card of your rival's deck from the game. If it was not an attack, ready this card. Enhance this attack gets +1 speed for every 3 cards in your rival's removed from game pile (maximum 4). Playable while committed.

name: Rikido Sato
text: Enhance [Twice per turn] Remove 1 card from your hand: Your attack gains Stun: 1. Draw 1 card. Response: After you draw 1 or more card during an Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 damage.

name: The Price For Peace
text: Form Discard your hand: Draw up to your printed hand size. If this is not your first form, at the start of the End Phase, lose the game. Deadlock Enhance Name a Fury or Punch card: Add any number of copies of the named card from your deck to your hand.

name: Toru Hagakure
text: Response [Once per turn]: After an attack is played, it gets +2 or -2 speed and gains Flash. Response Destroy 1 foundation: After your unblocked attack deals damage, your rival adds 1 ready foundation from their stage to their hand.
